databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.MS_VESSEL_ID, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.DELETE_FLAG, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.USER_KEY, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.DATA_NO, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.SEND_FLAG, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.VESSEL_ID, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.RENEW_DATE, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE.TS
FROM MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE

INSERT INTO MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE ( MS_VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID, MS_SI_MENJOU_ID, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID, DELETE_FLAG, USER_KEY, DATA_NO, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES ( :MS_VESSEL_ID, :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID, :MS_SI_MENJOU_ID, :MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID, :DELETE_FLAG, :USER_KEY, :DATA_NO, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_VESSEL_RANK_LICENSE SET DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID WHERE MS_VESSEL_ID = :MS_VESSEL_ID AND MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID AND MS_SI_MENJOU_ID = :MS_SI_MENJOU_ID AND MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID = :MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID AND TS = :TS
